      perPage
      currentPage
      lastPage

      isFollower
      isBlocked

  $MediaTrendMediaId: Int

  $MediaTrendDate_lesser: Int

  $MediaTrendTrending_lesser: Int

  $MediaTrendAverageScore_lesser: Int

  $MediaTrendPopularity_lesser: Int

  $MediaTrendEpisode_lesser: Int

    episode_lesser: $MediaTrendEpisode_lesser
